articles.title: UK economy shrank more than previously thought - BBC
articles.description: The economy has been weaker than previously estimated for much of this year, official figures show.
articles.content:
The UK economy shrank by more than first thought in the three months to September, revised figures show. 
The economy contracted by 0.3%, compared with a previous estimate of 0.2%, as business inves… [+4226 chars]
